Thank you all for the information provided on this board, it has been 
very=
 usefull.  I am running Hertirix 1.2 on windows XP/2003, and have 
come to =
a sticking point.  

When I extract the files from the arc the HTML contain=
ed within 
changes all references to be local/relative.  This is good.  
Un=
fortunately it references them via <page-name>?<param1>=3D<param1-
value> a=
nd so on.

So that the following are two distinct pages:

dynamicPage.asp?g=
et=3DsomeInfo
dynamicPage.asp?get=3DotherInfo

so as I extract the files fr=
om the ARC i need to save them using the 
page name and the URL parameters.=
  BUT WINDOWS (yes lovely windows) 
does not allow me to save a file witha =
 "?" in the name of the file.

what I thought would be a lovely solution wo=
uld be to add a custom 
module or extend an existing one, that would allow =
me to rewrite the 
url (in the hrefs) replacing the "?" with somthing more =
benign like 
a "-".  

Unforutnately I am confused as to where to start loo=
king. can someone 
point me in the right direction? (obviously the less cod=
e the 
better)...

Thank you

todd
